Comment: I remember watching the news coverage of destroyed city streets and hearing about people like David Dorn, murdered in cold blood , and being astonished that people actually did that, and more astonished that people I knew were defending it.   I remember being forced to sit in front of my computer for an entire day to take part in my school’s “racial equity day” where they had several speakers tell me that I had it better just because of the color of my skin.  I was only about 14 but it still sticks with me how crazy that era was.
